headline: Assurant Reaches $1 Million Milestone in Support of Move For Hunger
summary: ATLANTA, June 24, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes, and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced a $200,000 donation to Move For Hunger, a national non-profit dedicated to combatting food insecurity across North America. With this latest contribution, Assurant has donated more than $1 million to the organization, underscoring the collective power of its global workforce t
